desc_short: Boost HP/MP by 10%, and ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR, by 15%
提高10%HPMP、15%攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值
Aumenta VIT/PM un 10% y ATQ/DEF/MAG/ESP un 15%
desc_long: Boosts HP and MP by 10%, and ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR by 15%.
提高10%HPMP、15%攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值。
Aumenta la VIT y los PM un 10% y el ATQ, la DEF, la MAG y el ESP un 15%.
